author: franzoni
body:
This PR is incremental with respect to this other one https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17649 ; differences are updated [further down in this  conversation](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17886#issuecomment-286271239) (since more commits have been added);
there the differences are described with respect to such PR.
title: fix GEM geometry - HCAL emap - HCAL resoCorr HEP17 - SiStrip bad channels
